activities: Barnes & Noble, Inc. and its U.S. subsidiaries (other than those noted below) receive personal information from the EU/EEA and Switzerland as a result of its operations related to various web sites and services. The personal information we collect enables our company to provide goods and services to customers and users and allows us to personalize and improve the experience at our websites and on our mobile devices. We use this information for various purposes depending upon the goods or services being provided. These purposes may include (but are not limited to) the following: handling purchases; delivering products and services; communicating with customers and users about purchases, products, services and promotional offers; processing payments, updating our records and overall maintenance of customer and user accounts; displaying content; and recommending goods and services that might be of interest to our customers or users. We also use this information to prevent or detect fraud or abuse of our web sites, and enable certain third parties to carry out technical, logistical or other services on our behalf. This certification does not apply to the following subsidiaries and divisions:  Sterling Publishing Co, Inc., Tikatok LLC.
